title: Novel Drug Approvals for 2026
summary: FDA CDER landing page listing novel drug approvals for 2026; useful for monitoring new therapies and labeling updates.

title: 2023 Drug Safety Communications
summary: Index page of FDA Drug Safety Communications for 2023; good for safety signals, label changes, and risk communications.

title: ClinicalTrials.gov search: Genentech
summary: Search results for Genentech-sponsored or Genentech-related trials; use for pipeline tracking and trial milestone monitoring.

title: Roche media releases
summary: Roche press releases (often includes Genentech-related product and trial updates). Use to seed event ingestion.

title: Genentech press releases
summary: Genentech newsroom / press releases landing page for company and product announcements.

title: Fierce Pharma RSS
summary: RSS entry point for Fierce Pharma. Choose a specific sub-feed for pharma company and product news.

title: Reuters company page: Roche
summary: Company news hub for Roche (Genentech parent). Useful for major regulatory, earnings, and trial readout events.

title: EMA news and events
summary: EMA news/events hub for EU regulatory updates; complements FDA monitoring for global signals affecting products/markets.

title: NCI news and events
summary: Cancer research news and event announcements; relevant for oncology developments in Genentech's therapy areas.

title: ASH Clinical News
summary: Heme/onc clinical news and meeting coverage; relevant for antibody, oncology and hematology indications and trial readouts.

title: PubMed RSS: (ocrelizumab OR ofatumumab OR cladribine) AND multiple sclerosis
summary: PubMed RSS feed for MS therapies (ocrelizumab/ofatumumab/cladribine).
